mapper.insert: insert into pms_product_full_reduction (id, product_id, full_price, reduce_price) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reducePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select id, product_id, full_price, reduce_price from pms_product_full_reduction
